title: How Liverpool and Klopp almost didn't sign Salah
body_text:
How Liverpool and Klopp almost didn't sign Salah
Liverpool's former director of research Ian Graham reveals how Jurgen Klopp had to be persuaded to sign Egypt forward Mohamed Salah in 2017 rather than young Bundesliga star Julian Brandt.
Watch now on BBC iPlayer: How to Win the Champions League: Liverpool 2019
